entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the characters in the story. He is referred to by name and is described as sitting down with Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the characters in the story. He is referred to by name and is described as sitting down with Harry.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as a character in the story. He is referred to by name and is described as going to get something for Harry and Ron.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as a newspaper that has published an article about Arthur Weasley's fine.

entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: Arthur Weasley is mentioned in the story as being fined for bewitching a Muggle car. He is referred to by name and title (Head of the Misuse of Muggle Artefacts Office).

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is mentioned in the story as being a governor of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is referred to by name and title.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are described as sitting down together in the story.
Malfoy is described as going to get something from the Daily Prophet, which he then shows to Harry and Ron.
Arthur Weasley is mentioned in an article published in the Daily Prophet.

relationships.entity_2: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
relationships.description: Lucius Malfoy is described as being a governor of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
